dmca.title: Broadband Company Wants Documents Offline
dmca.body:
April 18, 2005
[private]

Re: Demand for Removal of Contracts, Uploads
    http://contracts.onecle.com/alpha/7677.shtml

Dear Sir/Madam:

It has come to our attention that the above-referenced Internet websites are displaying to the general public Asia Broadband, Inc. ("ASAB") contracts. This activity has not been sanctioned or approved by ASAB. ASAB has a vested proprietary interest in the use of its name, logo and intellectual property in the public domain and vigorously monitors its presence on the Internet as well as registered the name with the US Patent and Trademark office.

We accordingly demand that you immediately remove any and all documents that include the name Asia Broadband, Inc. from the sites listed above, as well as from any other sites which you own, control or operate.

We will review the sites within 10 days following the date of this letter to ensure that this request has been honored. Please be advised that ASAB will not hesitate to employ all available legal remedies to protect its interests.

Thank you for your anticipated cooperation with this request. Please feel free to contact me if you have any questions or would like to discuss this matter further. Tel: [private]

Sincerely,

[private]
Regional Operational Coordinator
Asia Broadband, Inc.
